description: Returns a list of all the VPC connections in this Region.

nested_items.name: VpcConnectionArn
nested_items.description: The ARN that identifies the Vpc Connection.

nested_items.name: TargetClusterArn
nested_items.description: The ARN that identifies the Cluster which the Vpc Connection belongs to.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: Creation time of the Vpc Connection.

nested_items.name: Authentication
nested_items.description: Information about the auth scheme of Vpc Connection.

nested_items.name: VpcId
nested_items.description: The vpcId that belongs to the Vpc Connection.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The paginated results marker. When the result of a ListClientVpcConnections operation is truncated, the call returns NextToken in the response. To get another batch of configurations, provide this token in your next request.
